title: Histoire(s) du Cinéma 4a: The Control of the Universe
original_title: Histoire(s) du cinéma 4a : le contrôle de l'univers
overview: Part 7 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
synopsis: Part 7 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
